title: 1st year summer break
content: Hello, I'm approaching the end of my 2nd sem, and we have about 2 months off after it's done. Was wondering what people usually get up to. Should I go after some sort of internship? Chill and hone my skills related to my field? Something else? Any advice is much appreciated!

comments.body: Try doing an internship. Gives you something to put on your resume, you'll be able to branch out and learn more about a domain, and the $$ doesn't hurt. Not many people in your btech domain might hire you as you are very young, so be open to domains while applying.
